vlive.korean: [오싹] 4월이었던 것 같아요. 4, 5월? [Shiver] I think it was April. Or May? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [S.M. THE ARTIST] Super Voice of YESUNG #03
vlive.english: [Shiver] I think it was April. Or May?

vlive.korean: 동고동락하면서 귀신을 쫓는 등골 오싹 테마 어드벤처 드라마입니다. share their joys and sorrows in this drama. 듣기 View video 2PM : <싸우자 귀신아> 등골 오싹 팬미팅
vlive.english: share their joys and sorrows in this drama.

vlive.korean: tvN 월화드라마 '싸우자 귀신아' 등골 오싹 팬미팅에 오신 여러분 진심으로 환영합니다. Welcome to the fan meeting for tvN drama “Hey Ghost, Let's Fight”. 듣기 View video 2PM : <싸우자 귀신아> 등골 오싹 팬미팅
vlive.english: Welcome to the fan meeting for tvN drama “Hey Ghost, Let's Fight”.

examples.korean: A shiver ran down my spine. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오싹 하는 전율이 내 등줄기를 타고 흘러내렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A shiver ran down my spine. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It horrified her to think that he had killed someone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 누군가를 죽였다고 생각하니 그녀는 오싹 소름이 끼쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It horrified her to think that he had killed someone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What he saw chilled his blood/chilled him to the bone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 눈앞의 광경에 그는 오싹 피가 식는 기분이었다/뼛속까지 오싹해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What he saw chilled his blood/chilled him to the bone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I shudder to think how much this is all going to cost. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 이 모든 것이 돈이 얼마나 많이 들 것인지를 생각하면 오싹 전율이 인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I shudder to think how much this is all going to cost. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: strike chill into a person's marrow 듣기 Add to Wordbook 뼛속까지 오싹 하는 느낌이 들게 하다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: strike chill into a person's marrow Add to Wordbook
